== Parra (626675) ==

Parra is a village in the [[Bardez]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 506.48 hectares and harbouring 1067 households with total population of 4449 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[MAPUSA]] is at a distance of 4 km. Male population is 2174 and female population is 2275. Scheduled Caste Population is 108 and Scheduled Tribes population is 4. Census Location Code of the village is 626675<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
